useCase.name: Check Data Usage
useCase.description: User queries about how their personal data is used.

preconditions.precondition: The user is logged into the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Data usage information is displayed successfully.

failureEndConditions.condition: Data usage information cannot be retrieved.

useCase.trigger: User initiates a query about data usage.

mainSequence.step: User asks "How is my personal data used?" to the ALFRED Interface.
ALFRED Interface shows the data usage info to the User.
